getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: Welcome to the ultimate guide for JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and React Native development! Whether you're building dynamic web apps or cross-platform mobile applications, this documentation has you covered with clear, practical resources.

Javascript/Beginner/introduction-to-java.title: JavaScript Basics
Javascript/Beginner/introduction-to-java.description: Hey there, future coder! ğŸš€ Welcome to the magical world of JavaScript (often just called JS). If you're new to programming, don't worryâ€”we're starting from the very beginning. Think of JavaScript as the secret sauce that makes websites come alive: buttons that respond when you click them, forms that check your input, and even games right in your browser.

Javascript/Beginner/loops.title: Loops
Javascript/Beginner/loops.description: Greetings, loop master in training! ğŸ”„ You've got decisions down patâ€”now let's add repetition to the mix. Loops are like your code's treadmill: they run the same block over and over until a condition says "stop!" Why? To handle lists, count things, or repeat actions without copying code a zillion times. Imagine printing "Hello" 100 times manuallyâ€”boring! Loops make it effortless.

Think of this as packing your backpack for a coding adventure: variables are your bags, and data types are the stuff you put inside.
